response.original_title: Le murmure des lieux qui nous habitent
response.overview: How can we keep Anne’s memory alive forever? To fight against inexorable oblivion, the filmmaker builds an imaginary house in which each room is inhabited by a memory of the absent woman, then she invites us inside her palace of memory. We then go through deserted rooms that are filled with stories… From the room to the kitchen, sometimes, the voices break, hesitate, overlap. But in the mess of memory, will it be possible to distinguish Anne’s voice? From this search for a lost path, the film opens and draws an offbeat, emotional portrait of the memories that inhabit us all.
response.title: Le murmure des lieux qui nous habitent
